```{r setup, echo = F}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library(p5sketch)
load_p5js()  # this inserts the link to p5.js, and it needs to be called only once per document.
```


## R Markdown

This is a demo of inserting a p5 sketch into an RMD file.
```{r, echo=F, warning=F, message = F}
insert_sketch("p5_canvas", "sketch_on_rmd.R")
```
